feature.label: KNIME Remote Workflow Control Executor (experimental)
feature.description: This features contains the server-side libraries (i.e. for the executor) enabling access to executor's workflows via the gateway API. It mainly allows an executor to respond to gateway API requests (e.g. via jsonrpc) from the server via MQ or RMI. This feature and the contained plug-ins are the intellectual property of KNIME AG, Zurich, Switzerland. This plug-in is not part of the Open Source KNIME Platform. It is not released under GPL, like most parts of KNIME. It is available at no charge and it can be used without restrictions. It is provided "as is", without any warranty. You may NOT freely copy it, nor modify or distribute it. For details, please refer to the license agreement.
